title: Armed homeowner and armed protesters had confrontation before shooting that left 1 dead, 5 injured in Portland, police say - CNN
content:
1. Armed homeowner and armed protesters had confrontation before shooting that left 1 dead, 5 injured in Portland, police say  CNN
  2. Portland police to discuss two fatal shootings  KGW News
  3. One Dead in Shooting at a Portland Protest Against Police Violence  The New York Times
  4. Deadly shootout in NE Portland stemmed from encounter between armed neighbor and protesters  OregonLive
  5. One Dead, Five Injured From Shooting at Black Lives Matter March  The Portland Mercury
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Saturday night shooting in Portland, Oregon, that left one woman dead and five people injured started with a confrontation between an armed homeowner and armed protesters, according to a Portland Police Bureau news release issued Sunday.
